hypothesis_content.title: Volatility Compression Breakout Regime Transition
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC 20-day realized volatility compresses below 30% (25th percentile) for 5+ consecutive days during NEUTRAL regime, a breakout above the 20-day Bollinger Band (2 std) with volume > 1.5x 20-day average will signal transition to BULL regime with 70% accuracy within 3 days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Extended low volatility periods during neutral regimes often precede significant directional moves. Institutional accumulation during quiet periods leads to explosive breakouts when new capital enters. Current MiCA regulatory clarity may provide fundamental catalyst for compressed volatility resolution.
entry_conditions: BTC 20-day realized volatility < 30% for 5+ consecutive days
BTC price closes above upper Bollinger Band (20-day, 2 std)

exit_conditions.take_profit: 5% gain from entry or regime shifts to BULL (confirmed by FjordHQ regime model)
exit_conditions.stop_loss: 2% loss from entry or price closes below 20-day SMA

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Breakout fails to sustain >48 hours and price returns within Bollinger Bands in >50% of occurrences over 6-month backtest.
